title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.3 - Positions requiring no examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.3 - Positions requiring no examination

State Regulations

By virtue of the character of their duties, it is found
impracticable to hold competitive or noncompetitive examinations for the
following positions that shall be filled by appointment of the
superintendent: (a) cleaners; (b) laborer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
477.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
